landing.title: Welcome to OwlLock
landing.subtitle: Keep your passwords safe and secure with owl-like vigilance and our advanced password management solution.

secureStorage.title: Secure Storage
secureStorage.description: Your passwords are encrypted and stored securely using advanced encryption algorithms.

easyAccess.title: Easy Access
easyAccess.description: Access your passwords anywhere, anytime with our user-friendly interface.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Generate strong, unique passwords with our built-in password generator.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.subtitle: Generate secure passwords with system fingerprint integration
passwordGenerator.noPasswordGenerated: Click generate to create a password
passwordGenerator.useFingerprint: Use System Fingerprint for Extra Security
passwordGenerator.errorGenerating: Error generating password. Please try again.

passwordModal.title: Save Password
passwordModal.subtitle: Store your generated password securely
passwordModal.errorSaving: Error saving password. Please try again.

passwords.title: My Passwords
passwords.subtitle: Manage your saved passwords securely
passwords.getStartedMessage: Start by creating your first password with our secure generator.
passwords.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search term or create a new password.
passwords.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this password?
passwords.confirmImport: Are you sure you want to import {count} passwords? This will add them to your existing passwords.
passwords.noPasswordsToExport: No passwords to export. Please add some passwords first.
passwords.exportLocation:
File saved: {fileName}
{count} passwords exported to your Downloads folder.
passwords.errorExporting: Error exporting passwords. Please try again.
passwords.errorImporting: Error importing passwords. Please try again.
passwords.errorInvalidBackup: Invalid backup file format. Please select a valid backup file.
passwords.errorLoading: Error loading passwords. Please try again.
passwords.errorDeleting: Error deleting password. Please try again.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Export your passwords to a secure backup file or import from an existing backup.
backup.exportDescription: Create an encrypted backup of all your passwords
backup.importDescription: Import passwords from an encrypted backup file
backup.enterBackupPassword: Enter a strong password for encryption
backup.passwordHint: Remember this password - you'll need it to restore your backup
backup.selectFile: Select a backup file to import
backup.exportSuccess: Backup exported successfully to owllock folder!
backup.invalidFileFormat: Invalid or corrupted backup file format
backup.noPasswordsInFile: No passwords found in backup file
backup.duplicatePasswordsDetected: Some passwords already exist and were skipped
backup.passwordDescription: Your backup will be encrypted for security. Don't forget this password, as you'll need it to restore the backup.
backup.localBackupDescription: Your passwords will be securely encrypted and saved to your computer.
backup.localComputerDescription: Save encrypted backup file to your computer
backup.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
backup.creationFailed: An error occurred while creating the backup
